title: How to Cook Brown Rice and Lentils Together in a Rice Cooker

steps.headline: Rinse and drain the lentils and rice (you may wish to wash them together for the sake of time) multiple times, either using a wire strainer or the pot of your rice cooker.
Add the lentils, rice, water/stock, and, optionally, seasoning and pre-cooked vegetables.
When finished, unplug the cooker and set it aside with the lid partially removed to allow the food to cool a bit.

tyn: Rice cooker of an appropriate size.
A non-metal stirring device (anything metal will most likely scratch the inside of a rice cooker and damage it).
text: Rinse and drain the lentils and rice (you may wish to wash them together for the sake of time) multiple times, either using a wire strainer or the pot of your rice cooker.  Add the lentils, rice, water/stock, and, optionally, seasoning and pre-cooked vegetables.  Stir well.  Secure lid.  Cook for 35 minutes.  When finished, unplug the cooker and set it aside with the lid partially removed to allow the food to cool a bit.  Finished.
